name: Guinness Draught
description: Rich and creamy. Distinctively black. Velvety in its finish. This iconic beer is defined by harmony.

name: Heineken
description: Crisp and refreshing lager with a slightly bitter finish.

name: Punk IPA
description: A post modern classic. Spiky. Tropical. Hoppy.

name: Corona Extra
description: The classic Mexican beer, best served with a lime wedge.

name: Sierra Nevada Pale Ale
description: A delight of American piney hops and grapefruit aromas.

name: Chimay Blue
description: Dark, complex, and rich with flavors of dried fruit and caramel.

name: Asahi Super Dry
description: Japan's No.1 beer. Crisp, dry, and quick finish.

name: Weihenstephaner Hefe Weissbier
description: The oldest brewery in the world. A classic wheat beer with banana and clove notes.

name: Stone IPA
description: An iconic West Coast IPA. Citrusy, piney, and hop-forward.

name: Duvel
description: A natural beer with a subtle bitterness, a refined flavour and a distinctive hop character.

name: Pilsner Urquell
description: The original Pilsner. Golden, clear, and perfectly balanced.

name: Lagunitas IPA
description: A well-rounded, highly drinkable IPA. A bit of Caramel Malt barley provides the richness that mellows out the twang of the hops.
